page.title: 09HOME LIFE
page.content: MILK QUESTIONNAIRE We gave a questionnaire to nearly 50 families in Whitwell to see how milk was used by the population today. 1.37 families use 105 pints daily. 2.Out of 37 families 75% have milk delivered and 25% buy theirs from a shop. 3.Out of 169 people 135 people like milk on their cereals. 4.32 families drink milk by itself. 5.Out of 169 people 161 people like milk in their tea or coffee. 6.134 people like heated milk. 7.Every family uses milk for cooking. 8.18 out of 37 families have pets that drink milk. 9.19 out of 37 families use powdered milk. 10.36 out of 37 families think milk is good for you.
